title: [CY] Your reasons for appealing
titleEdit: [CY] Enter a reason for your appeal
dwpExplained: [CY] DWP should have explained their decision on your entitlement to {{benefitType}} in the Mandatory Reconsideration Notice (MRN) or the decision letter they sent you.
readYouMRN: [CY] Read your MRN or the decision letter and write what you disagree with and why. Your reasons will be considered by an independent tribunal who are separate from DWP.
placeholder: [CY] You can write as much as you want
listError: [CY] Enter at least one reason for your appeal

error.notEnough: [CY] You have not said enough about what you want to appeal. Briefly explain what you disagree with.

error.required: [CY] You need to give at least one reason for appealing
error.notEnough: [CY] You have not said enough about why you want to appeal. Briefly explain why you disagree with DWPâ€™s decision.
